title: The Infinite and the Divine
author: Robert Rath
description: A millennia-spanning game of cat and mouse between Trazyn the Infinite and Orikan the Diviner.

title: Crisis of Faith
author: Phil Kelly
description: Commander Farsight leads an expedition to the Damocles Gulf and begins to question the Ethereal Caste.

title: Devastation of Baal
author: Guy Haley
description: The entire Blood Angels chapter and their successors stand against the might of Hive Fleet Leviathan.

title: The Last Hunt
author: MacNiven
description: White Scars must outmaneuver the rapid evolution of a Tyranid splinter fleet.

title: The Emperor's Legion
author: Chris Wraight
description: The Golden Guardians of Terra step out from the Palace as the Great Rift opens.

title: Brutal Kunnin
author: Mike Brooks
description: Ufthak Blackhawk leads a massive Waaagh! against a Forge World, seen from the Ork perspective.

title: The Emperor's Gift
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: The secret history of the Grey Knights during the First War for Armageddon.

title: Helsreach
author: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
description: Grimaldus leads the defense of a hive city against an endless tide of Orks.

title: Lion: Son of the Forest
author: Guy Haley
description: The Primarch Lion El'Jonson returns to a galaxy he no longer recognizes.

title: The Lords of Silence
author: Chris Wraight
description: A deep look into the decaying philosophy and brutal warfare of Mortarion's sons.

title: The Red Feast
author: Matthew Farrer
description: The origins of Kharn and the descent of the XII Legion into Khorne's madness.

title: Valedor
author: Guy Haley
description: Aeldari and Drukhari must unite to prevent two Tyranid Hive Fleets from merging.

title: Fifteen Hours
author: Mitchel Scanlon
description: A grim look at the life expectancy of a new recruit in the trenches of the 41st millennium.

title: Day of Ascension
author: Adrian Tchaikovsky
description: A revolutionary uprising on a Forge World turns into a nightmare as the 'Angels' arrive.

title: Dante
author: Guy Haley
description: The life story of the oldest living Space Marine and the burden of command.

title: Master of Sanctity
author: Gav Thorpe
description: The Inner Circle goes to extreme lengths to capture one of the Fallen.

title: Ghazghkull Thraka: Prophet of the Waaagh!
author: Nate Crowley
description: The rise of the greatest Warboss in the galaxy, told by his favorite Grot.

title: Gate of Bones
author: Andy Clark
description: Custodes and Imperial Guard defend a vital pilgrimage world from Chaos.

title: Fire Warrior
author: Simon Spurrier
description: A lone Shas'la must survive a nightmare mission against the forces of Chaos.

title: Gaunt's Ghosts: First and Only
author: Dan Abnett
description: The beginning of the legendary Sabbat Worlds Crusade through the eyes of Colonel-Commissar Gaunt.
